code: import axios from'axios';var timeout=5000;var localhost="http://localhost:8080";var currentDate=new Date();export default{getAllProblems:function getAllProblems(){var allProblemsUrl="".concat(localhost,"/api/problems");return axios.get(allProblemsUrl,{timeout:timeout});},createNewProblem:function createNewProblem(author,title,description){var createProblemsUrl="".concat(localhost,"/api/problems");return axios.post(createProblemsUrl,{author:author,title:title,description:description,createdAt:currentDate,updatedAt:currentDate});}};
